div.pre: 385 Kalamaria, near Thessalonica, Mace- donia, 1963 Burial: c. 340-335 B.C. Contents: 240 AR. Pot hoard Acanthus: 3 tetradr. Chalcidian League: 1 tetradr. Philip II: 136 tetradr. Larissa: 62 dr. Boeotia: 32 st. Sicyon: 6 st. Disposition: Athens Varoucha, A Delt 1964, Chronika, p. 8, illus. There is a discrepancy in the figures in the publication
